thesis: Adobe remains a high-margin, cash-generative software leader trading at a discounted trailing P/E versus major software peers; key debate is GenAI monetization durability versus competitive disruption. Base case assumes stable execution and partial valuation normalization.
risk_flags: AI-native competitive disruption in creative workflows
Potential multiple compression if growth guidance weakens
Monetization risk for generative AI features
Elevated volatility and drawdown risk in narrative resets
Data-source limitations due to filing/page access throttling
